attributes.action: Request a National Enquiry into the Child Grooming Gangs Scandal.
attributes.additional_details: We Demand Justice for the Children that are and have been Groomed,Drugged,Abused,Raped,even Murdered, by the Gangs for there own perverted Sexual Gratification. This must include Past and present cases in order to ensure that our Children are no longer assumed as Prey by these vile Gangs or Individuals. There needs to be Transparency in all cases of Child Abuse and Exploitation Ensuring the Safeguarding of our Children.
attributes.background: I want the Goverment and Members of Parliment to Launch an Independent Investigation into the Child Grooming Gangs Ensuring those found to be involved are Brought to Justice and Face Prosecution.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
